images.caption: Figure 1:Photorealistic 3D caricature avatars produced by our method.

Figure 2:CaricatureGS generation framework.(1)From a subject’s multi-view video, we extract a FLAME mesh and compute a curvature-driven caricature based on it.
Combined with subject-specific FLAME parameters, this yields the subject’s caricature mesh.(2)Per-triangle 2D affine transforms map the neutral mesh projection to its caricatured counterpart, warping each frame to generate pseudo–ground-truth image pairs.(3)Anisotropic 3D Gaussians primitives are bound to the original mesh and transformed to the caricature mesh via the corresponding 3D triangle transforms.
Rendered neutral and caricature views are alternated and compared to their pseudo–ground-truth counterparts in joint optimization.
